body.name: Zoom Certified, NexiGo N970P 4K Webcam, Onboard Flash Memory, Al-Powered Auto-Framing, Adjutable Field of View, Sony Sensor, Dual AI Noise-Cancelling Mics, Works with Teams/Zoom/Webex/Google (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 【4K Sony CMOS Sensor】The N970P is built with a Sony CMOS sensor that features up to 3840x2160 UHD resolution at 30 frames per second, producing vivid imagery with outstanding clarity, vibrant color rendition, and crisp details. Super high SNR imagery is achieved with low noise CMOS even in low light conditions.

【OSD Menu & Flash Memory】Directly save any specific settings to the webcam itself for instant recall, even when switching between computers or devices. With built-in OSD menu, you can adjust all the image parameters without installing any software. It's perfect for work computers and corporate environment. NexiGo’s product algorithms and firmware are stored and run within its hardware with edge computing technology. This ensures top-level data security and privacy protection.
【Al-Powered Auto-Framing】Advanced face detection AI will automatically frame the video according to the number of people in the meeting, keeping the video's focus centralized.

【Remote with 10X Digital Zoom】Easily controls your video calls with the included remote, even from a distance. Turn the webcam off, zoom in or out, and more. With 10X digital zoom, the NexiGo N970P webcam makes it possible to zoom in or out gradually with a single press of a button. (Note: Please ensure that you have disabled the auto framing function and closed the OSD menu before using the zoom function.)

【Dual Mics & Wide Compatibility】With noise-canceling technology to remove ambient sounds that would interfere with communication, the one talking could be heard loud and clear within the distance of up to 6 meters. Plug and play, no additional drivers required. Ready to use in approximately one minute or less on any compatible device. Compatible with Mac OS X 10.7 and higher / Windows 7, 8, 10 & 11 / Android 4.0 or higher / Linux 2.6.24 / Chrome OS 29.0.1547 / Ubuntu Version 10.04 or above.

Do I need to install software to use it? No, you don't have to install software, just plug and play. The webcam also has a built-in OSD menu that allows adjusting parameters with convenient remote control. Why is the OSD menu mirrored? Some video software mirrors your camera view by default. You can press and hold the menu button on the remote for at least two seconds to mirror the OSD menu. Can I control multiple cameras with just one remote? Our original remote has multi-cam functionality which supports up to control four N970P webcams. If you prefer the original version, please feel free to contact NexiGo Support Team. What are the ideal distance range and microphone pickup distance for the N970P? The microphone pickup distance is up to 20ft away, but our recommendation for the n970P is to set it up less than 10ft away for the highest video quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The unit as a whole is in mint condition although the remote control came without the battery cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job well, good value for money.
reviews.reviewText: Needed a good quality 'portable' (usable with various operating systems) reliable 4k webcam and this unit did not disappoint. Straight out of the box and plug'n played seamlessly with Windows PC, laptop, Apple Mac and Android TV. Remote operates well and auto framing works but good to be able to stop the function as and when required. Had it a month now in Australia and have used it 8 times with no dramas. Unit was shipped from USA and arrived in good order and slightly ahead of schedule. No hesitation to recommend as a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
